trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANANA403_03052_SEQ_00<tab>Eshana needs help with a pair of troublesome griffins.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

TEXT_BANANA403_03052_ESHANA_000_000<tab>We have a requessst from the griffin handlers. Giff tells me that a young pair of griffin sssiblings butted heads during training, and then flew off in a flurry of talons and feathers.
TEXT_BANANA403_03052_ESHANA_000_001<tab>These cloudkin are prideful creatures─easily aggravated and difficult to tame─but you ssseem to have a way with them.

TEXT_BANANA403_03052_ESHANA_000_002<tab>If you're willing to help, they were lassst ssseen heading north. The smaller griffin veered ssslightly to the wessst after a final ssswipe from his bigger brother, who banked away to the eassst.
TEXT_BANANA403_03052_ESHANA_000_003<tab>Once you've rallied the younger's ssspirits and sssoothed the older's agitation, I'm certain they'll find their way back to the ssstables on their own.
TEXT_BANANA403_03052_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>The griffin responds to your soothing tone, becoming visibly calmer!
TEXT_BANANA403_03052_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>The griffin eyes you with obvious distrust...
TEXT_BANANA403_03052_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>The griffin appears agitated and unhappy. Use the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>soothe<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> emote to calm the creature.
TEXT_BANANA403_03052_SYSTEM_000_013<tab>The griffin's mood seems improved by your encouragement!

TEXT_BANANA403_03052_SYSTEM_000_015<tab>The small griffin appears to be sulking after losing to his older brother. Use the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>rally<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> emote to lift his spirits.

TEXT_BANANA403_03052_ESHANA_000_020<tab>Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─the griffin sssiblings are back in their ssstables, sssafe and sssound. They show great promissse, but the lively temperament for which they are admired is a double-edged sssword for those who ssstruggle to tame them.

TEXT_BANANA403_03052_ESHANA_000_021<tab>And yet you handled them with relative ease! You have a talent for reaching the heartsss of both man and beassst─the trainers will be mossst enviousss to hear of your effortless sssuccess.
